text: The 44 - year - old made the most of the good weather today, as she took a stroll with the former professional footballer. Treating fans to a clip from their day out, David could be seen feeding some ducks as the duo spent time in a park. The fashion - forward star sported an all - black ensemble, as he donned a pair of jeans, a hooded jumper and matching flat cap. Laughing at the attention the animals were paying to the 43 - year - old, Victoria teased her husband over his popularity. As she videoed her spouse, the former Spice Girls star exclaimed : “ Even the ducks like you! ”
